channel.title: Help with ess miner plzplz jsut have a look
channel.description: can some1 help me with this script? i need some1 to randomize itz clicks!!! sometimes there is no visible magic shop icon and the script doesnt know where to go can some1 fix it?? sometimes it clicks on adbury and clicks trade not teleport i need it to close the rune trade window! and sometimes it clicks teleport but doesnt get teled and then doesnt no where it is and goes somewhere else,, i want it to know that it it still at the rune shop and click teleport adbury again....! if you have the pick unweilded it goes to bank and deposits the pick and ess.. i want it to only deposit the esss.maybe u could improve the pickaxe head finder aswell? and plzplzplzplz put it some anti radoms becouse it cant even handle a drunken dwarf!!! here is the script.. plz email the corrected script to killer_bee_rox@hotmail.com thank is advance!!! opps how do i send a script it says The message exceeds the maximum allowed length (20000 characters). anyway email me if you want to help and ill send u the script and i also have messenger..

omg guys i dont know whose this script is i found it on freewebs!!! i didnt know it was that solemen wishes’s guys im so sorry dude!!im not a scripter i got the script from somewhere!!! so if you guys cant help then…i cant script i tryed some tuturiols but still…so if you guys could help then…

srry again that solem wishes guys i dont know who leeched that script but i found it on the web and i thought someone might help make it better… and btw i saw one of your script solem wishes and i didnt find it worked to well :mad:

item.title: Help with ess miner plzplz jsut have a look
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

so not only did that person write like a total twat, he also stole others work without giving any credit and then couldnt even get it to work!
well thats a ‘noob’ if you’ve never seen one!

sorry mate but people dont like leechers on this forum!

trust me when i say that if you keep leeching and stealing peoples scripts then you will become very unpopular… take a hint
learn how to script from the very handy guides on this forum that way if you every want to cheat you dont have to look a fool to do so! (if that makes sense)

i havnt been on this forum for very long what so ever but i got down and dirty learning to script. (which i am still not great at) but its a working progress!

thats all
H.T.Y.A

ps. good luck

item.title: Help with ess miner plzplz jsut have a look
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

you are like the 5th person to do that you know, you know nothign about scripting “at all” then you take my script “without asking” pretend that you have changed something “pretend” all you did was take my name out of it bitch. Then complian that it dont work…

program insanityEssMiner; first thing u changed

// VARROK ESSENCE MINER BY INSAITY // second

writeln(' //YOU ARE USING Insanity ESSENCE MINER \\') third thing

frmDesign.Caption := 'insanty ess'; fourth

writeln(' <This essence miner was created by joshie >'); my favrout

please please please learn that putting your name in something in alot of cases is “illegal” and
any, if any respect i could of ever had for is gone. FUCK YOU.

item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:4, topic:5639”]lol stop bagging my writing guys atleast u culd understand it…itz not my script but i asked the guy who made it he said he didnt no how to fix it and allowed me to post it sooooooo… im so used to msn thats y my ritin is shortened!!! but i need help!! so plz help ppl… herez the attachment thanks madcow. i dont know how to script i need some one to fix it up thats all…email me at killer_bee_rox@hotmail.com(i know itz a crap email i made it when i was in grade 3 lol)… by post b4!

can some1 help me with this script? i need some1 to randomize itz clicks!!! sometimes there is no visible magic shop icon and the script doesnt know where to go can some1 fix it?? sometimes it clicks on adbury and clicks trade not teleport i need it to close the rune trade window! and sometimes it clicks teleport but doesnt get teled and then doesnt no where it is and goes somewhere else, i want it to know that it it still at the rune shop and click teleport adbury again…! if you have the pick unweilded it goes to bank and deposits the pick and ess… i want it to only deposit the esss.maybe u could improve the pickaxe head finder aswell?/ and plzplzplzplz put some anti radoms becouse it cant even handle a drunken dwarf!!! (it has no anti randoms i think)[/quote]

This script is outdated. If I was you I would go to the request section and request an ess miner.
May take a couple of weeks but it beats nothing

No problem,
Mad Cow

item.title: Help with ess miner plzplz jsut have a look
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

Just out of curiousity. Is this script yours? If not then get permission from the Author to post it.

Also try to make your writing a little more readable
eg. some1 -> someone, itz -> its, plzplzplz -> please etc.

And also try laying out your writing a little better.

hint Use attachments.
Hope this helped,
Mad Cow

Read full topic
